Articles.Content:
Im assuming a bunch of you guys are game designers or hobbyist artists/programmers.

Anyone else getting into Ludum Dare 22 this weekend? http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/

Ill be trying to squeeze in some hours between a family Christmas event, working and maybe even sleeping??

Who else is in??
would be if my computer would work for more than 1 second. The thing crashed about 1-2 weeks ago and I can get if fixed till January.
